verbose_text: In addition, NKp44 mediated recognition of tumor associated fibroblasts can lead to the release of high amounts of TNF-alpha, thus influencing the vascular permeability and inducing pro inflammatory responses in the tumor microenvironment.
evidence: NKp44-mediated recognition of tumor associated fibroblasts can lead to the release of high amounts of TNF-alpha, thus influencing the vascular permeability and inducing pro-inflammatory responses in the tumor microenvironment
